links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 10..1000
formula: Number of 15-subsequences of [ 1, n ] with just 2 contiguous pairs; g.f. 6*(11+2x)*x^10/(1-x)^14a(n) = C(n+1, 11)*C(n+2, 2). - _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 13 2005, corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 15 2016
author: thi ngoc dinh (via _R. K. Guy_)
